spec_data.Name: perl-App-cpanminus
spec_data.Description:
Why? It's dependency free, requires zero configuration, and stands alone
but it's maintainable and extensible with plug-ins and friendly to shell
scripting. When running, it requires only 10 MB of RAM.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:07:11 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Get, unpack, build and install CPAN modules
